title: Keto Bacon Meatloaf
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (205°C). Grease a medium baking dish with cooking spray.
Heat olive oil in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add onion and celery. Cook until soft, about 5 minutes.
Stir in garlic, oregano, and chili powder. Cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
In a large bowl, combine ground beef, cooled vegetable mixture, cheddar cheese, almond flour, Parmesan, eggs, and soy sauce.
Season generously with salt and pepper. Mix until well combined.
Shape mixture into a large loaf in the prepared baking dish.
Lay bacon strips on top of the meatloaf.
Bake until bacon is crispy and beef is cooked through, about 1 hour. If bacon is cooking too quickly, cover dish with foil.
Let rest for 5-10 minutes before slicing and serving.
notes: Volume conversions: 1 tbsp olive oil ≈ 14g, 1 medium onion ≈ 150g, 1 celery stalk ≈ 40g, 3 garlic cloves ≈ 15g, 1 tsp oregano ≈ 3g, 1 tsp chili powder ≈ 3g, 2 lb ground beef ≈ 907g, 1 cup cheddar ≈ 113g, ½ cup almond flour ≈ 60g, ¼ cup Parmesan ≈ 28g, 2 eggs ≈ 100g, 1 tbsp soy sauce ≈ 15g, 6 bacon strips ≈ 180g
Keto-friendly with almond flour instead of breadcrumbs
Cover with foil if bacon browns before meatloaf is cooked through
Per serving: 450 calories, 46g protein, 6g carbs, 2g fiber, 27g fat
